ComicInfo.Tags: Dodo,Buzzy Brown,Doodles Duck,Rudy Raccoon,Raccoon Kids,Bo Bunny,Pig-Iron,Frog,Mugsy Mole,Rollo Raccoon
ComicInfo.Title: Watch the Birdie!; A-Farming We Will Go!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Muggsy wants to enter a contest to judge the handsomest and strongest mole.
Lemuel and his friends trick Doodles into flooding the basement so they can go swimming.
Bo and Skinny meet Bully Bear and can't get rid of him.
Fenimore strings a rope across the road so Dunbar will trip on it.
Farmer MacDougall hires the boys to help out on the farm but they are hopelessly bad at it.
